Class-Druid 20 -- Female Half-Elf Druid: 20
Strength: 20 (+5) Dexterity: 18 (+4) Constitution: 18 (+4) Intelligence: 18 (+4) Wisdom: 20 (+5) Charisma: 16 (+3)
Background: Acolyte Alignment: Neutral Good Deity: Shelyn (NG)
Experience: 19500/20000 Level: 20 Speed: 25 Size: Medium
Ability Notes:
Ability Boosts: Ability Boost (Choose 20 from any)
Feather Step: May Step into difficult terrain
Woodland Stride: May move normally over difficult terrain caused by plants or fungi
Features/Skills

Feature Notes:
Ancestry Feats: 5 selections
Animal: Has the Animal Companion feature
Clever Improviser: Has Untrained Improvisation feature
Druid Feats: 10 selections
Druidic Order: 1 selection
General Feats: 5 selections
Half-Elf: Has the Low-Light Vision feature
Leaf: Has the Leshy Familiar feature
Order Explorer (Animal): +1 Class Feat
Order Explorer (Leaf): +1 Class Feat
Order Explorer (Storm): +1 Class Feat
Order Explorer (Wild): +1 Class Feat
Skill Feats: 10 selections
Storm: Has the Storm Born feature
Wild: Has the Wild Shape feature
Anathema: May not perform acts or cast spells prohibited by druidic orders
Animal Companion: Has a young animal companion
Enhanced Familiar: May select 4 familiar or master abilities each day
Incredible Companion: Animal Companion gains choice of nimble or savage characteristics
Leshy Familiar: Has a Tiny plant or fungus familiar
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Mature Animal Companion: Animal Companion is a mature companion and may Stride or Strike without a command
Order Explorer (Animal): May learn Animal order feats
Order Explorer (Leaf): May learn Leaf order feats
Order Explorer (Storm): May learn Storm order feats
Order Explorer (Wild): May learn Wild order feats
Specialized Companion: Animal Companion has choice of specialization
Timeless Nature: Does not age
Train Animal: May use 7 days' training and a successful Nature check to teach an animal to perform a trick
Verdant Metamorphosis: Has plant, not humanoid, trait
Perception: +29 (wisdom; expert)
Skill Modifiers:
Acrobatics: +28 (dexterity; expert) Folktale Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Performance: +23 (charisma; untrained)

Druid Skills: Skill Trained (Nature; Choose 6 from any)

Intelligence Language Bonus: +4 Language Count

Storm: Skill Trained (Acrobatics)
Untrained Improvisation: +20 on untrained skill checks
Wild: Skill Trained (Intimidation)
Assurance (Athletics): May forgo rolling a Athletics check for an automatic 32
Assurance (Religion): May forgo rolling a Religion check for an automatic 34
Bargain Hunter: +2 initial gold/May use Diplomacy to Earn Income
Clever Improviser: May use any skill untrained
Cooperative Nature: +4 Aid checks
Courtly Graces: May use Society to impersonate a noble or to Make an Impression on one
Green Empathy: May use Diplomacy with plants and fungi to Make an Impression and to make simple Requests with a +2 bonus
Storm Born: Suffers no Perception penalties from weather
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Wild Empathy: May use Diplomacy with animals to Make an Impression and to make simple Requests
Combat
Hit Points: 248 Armor Class: 39 (dexterity (2 max); expert)
Armor: Scale Mail Shield: Buckler (+1 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 6) Weapons: Heavy Crossbow (+28 1d10 P R120'; dexterity; expert); Javelin (+28 1d6+5 P R30'; dexterity; expert); Morningstar (+29 1d6+5 B/P; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +80
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Druid Weapon Expertise: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Medium Armor Expertise: Defense Expert (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +5
Unconventional Weaponry (Bastard Sword): Treats Bastard Sword as one category simpler
Weapon Proficiency (Club): Attack Trained (Club)
Weapon Proficiency (Greatclub): Attack Trained (Greatclub)
Weapon Proficiency (Hand Crossbow): Attack Trained (Hand Crossbow)
Weapon Proficiency (Longsword): Attack Trained (Longsword)
Shield Block: (R) When shield is raised, may negate damage up to its hardness and have it absorb half of remaining damage
Side By Side: Self and companion automatically flank a foe adjacent to both
Storm Retribution: (R) On a foe critical melee hit, may cast Tempest Surge, pushing foe 5' (Ref neg; critical failure pushes 10')
Weapon Specialization: +2/+3/+4 HP damage with expert/master/legendary weapon proficiency
Save: Fortitude: +28 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +28 (dexterity; expert); Will: +31 (wisdom; master)
Save Notes:
Great Fortitude: Save Expert (Fortitude)
Lightning Reflexes: Save Expert (Reflex)
Resolve: Save Master (Will)
Haughty Obstinacy: Successful saves vs. mental control are critical successes/Foe Intimidation (Coerce) fails are critical fails
Poison Resistance: Has poison resistance 10/+1 saves vs. poison
Resolve: Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Timeless Nature: +2 saves vs. disease and primal magic
Magic
Spell Slots: P0: 5; P10: 2; P1: 3; P2: 3; P3: 3; P4: 3; P5: 3; P6: 3; P7: 3; P8: 3; P9: 3 Focus Points: 6 Attack: Primal: +33 (wisdom; legendary) Spell DC: Primal: 43 (wisdom; legendary)

Magic Notes:
Animal: Knows the Heal Animal spell
Druidic Order: Has a focus pool with 1 Focus Point
Expert Spellcaster: Spell Expert (Primal)
Fey Caller: Knows the Illusory Disguise, Illusory Object, Illusory Scene, and Veil primal spells
Hierophant's Power: +1 10th level spell slot
Impaling Briars: Knows the Impaling Briars spell/+1 Focus Points
Invoke Disaster: Knows the Storm Lord spell/+1 Focus Points
Leaf: Knows the Goodberry spell/+1 Focus Points
Legendary Spellcaster: Spell Legendary (Primal)
Master Spellcaster: Spell Master (Primal)
Order Magic (Animal): Knows the Heal Animal spell
Order Magic (Leaf): Knows the Goodberry spell
Order Magic (Storm): Knows the Tempest Surge spell
Order Magic (Wild): Knows the Wild Morph spell
Primal Hierophant: Has 1 10th-level spell slot
Primal Summons: Knows the Primal Summons spell
Storm: Knows the Tempest Surge spell/+1 Focus Points
Wild Shape: Knows the Wild Shape spell
Wild: Knows the Wild Morph spell
Wind Caller: Knows the Stormwind Flight spell/+1 Focus Points
Call Of The Wild: May spend 10 min to replace a prepared spell with Summon Animal or Summon Plant Or Fungus of the same level
Dragon Shape: May use Wild Shape to change into a Large dragon and to gain resistance 5 to choice of acid, cold, electricity, fire, or poison
Effortless Concentration: (F) May extend the duration of 1 spell
Elemental Shape: May use Wild Shape to change into a Medium elemental and to gain resistance 5 to fire
Ferocious Shape: May use Wild Shape to change into a Large dinosaur and to gain +1 on Athletics checks
Form Control: (1) May cast Wild Shape 2 levels lower to retain shape for up to 1 hour
Green Tongue: Self and any leshy familiar have continuous Speak With Plants effects
Healing Transformation: (1) May have self polymorph spells restore 1d6 Hit Points per spell level
Insect Shape: May use Wild Shape to change into a Medium insect; flightless forms last 24 hour
Leyline Conduit: (1) May cast instantaneous spells of 5th level and lower without expending a spell slot
Monstrosity Shape: May use Wild Shape to change into a phoenix, purple worm or sea serpent
Overwhelming Energy: (1) May cast a spell that ignores resistance 20 to choice of energy
Perfect Form Control: May cast Wild Shape 2 levels lower to retain shape permanently
Plant Shape: May use Wild Shape to change into a Large plant and to gain resistance 5 to poison
Primal Focus: Refocus restores 2 Focus Points
Primal Spellcasting: May learn spells from the primal tradition
Primal Summons: Summoned creatures gain choice of air, earth, fire, or water elemental power
Primal Wellspring: Refocus restores 3 Focus Points
Reach Spell: (1) May extend spell range by 30'
Soaring Shape: May use Wild Shape to change into a wasp, pterosaur, bat or bird and to gain +1 on Acrobatics checks
Steady Spellcasting: A successful DC 15 flat check negates self spellcasting disruption
Storm Born: Suffers no ranged spell penalties from weather
Thousand Faces: May use Wild Shape to change into a Small or Medium humanoid
True Shapeshifter: (2) May change shapes during Wild Shape/May Wild Shape into a kaiju or green man 1/day
Verdant Metamorphosis: May use Tree Shape effects at will; tree form raises AC to 30, allows 10 min in sunlight to restore half Hit Points, and allows daily rest to restore all Hit Points and remove all non-permanent conditions, poisons, and diseases
Widen Spell: (1) May increase the effect of a 10' or greater radius area spell by 5', the effect of a 15' or shorter line or cone spell by 5', and the effect of a longer line or cone spell by 10'
